Gonagasbárra álggahii ieas nuppi stáhtaguossástallanbeaivvi Tyrkias Norgga- Tyrkia ealáhusseminárain Ankaras. Majestehta Gonagas rabai dien seminára, man váldofáddán lea ođasmahtti energiija ja čáhcefápmu.

Tyrkias leat ollu vejolavuođat hukset čáhcefápmorusttegiid, ja otná semináras, man fáddán lei ođasmahtti energiija, vuolláičállojuvvui intenuvdnasoahpamu mii guoská Norgga ja Tyrkia ovttasbargui energiijasuorggis. Gonagas Kong Harald namuhii dien ái go rabai seminára:

Our cooperation is broad in scope, and designed to promote Turkish and Norwegian actors common interests. The hydropower sector is a case in point. This clean and renewable energy source furthers economic development and provides energy security. Not only is hydropower climate-friendly, but it also provides well for the energy needs of future generations.
Norge har stor erfaring med vannkraft, og Kongen pekte på mulighetene for kompetanseoverføring både på det tekniske og det administrative området.
